Module c195.c195assessment
Package c195.c195assessment.controller

Class AddCustomerController

java.lang.Object
c195.c195assessment.controller.AddCustomerController
public class AddCustomerController extends Object
Controller for the Add Customer view, providing functionality to input and submit new customer records.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddCustomerController

      public AddCustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. This method is called after the FXML file has been loaded. It prepares the form by populating the choice boxes for countries and first level divisions based on database entries. It also sets a listener for the country choice box to filter divisions based on the selected country.

    • getCountries

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> getCountries()
      Retrieves the observable list of all countries that can be selected in the country choice box. This list is populated from the database and used to allow the user to select a country for the new customer.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Country objects.

    • setCountries

      public void setCountries(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> countries)
      Sets the observable list of countries available for selection when adding a new customer. This method updates the list of countries based on data retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      countries - An ObservableList of Country objects.

    • getFirstLevelDivisions

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> getFirstLevelDivisions()
      Retrieves the observable list of all first level divisions relevant to the selected country. This list is filtered based on the country selected by the user and used to populate the first level division choice box.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of FirstLevelDivision objects.

    • setFirstLevelDivisions

      public void setFirstLevelDivisions(javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> firstLevelDivisions)
      Sets the observable list of first level divisions available for selection based on the selected country. This method is used to update the list of divisions shown to the user after selecting a country.
      Parameters:
      firstLevelDivisions - An ObservableList of FirstLevelDivision objects.

    • confirmButtonHandler

      public void confirmButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the confirmation action for adding a new customer. Validates input fields, creates a new Customer object from the input, and inserts it into the database. Upon successful insertion, the scene switches back to the customer main view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this method.

    • cancelButtonHandler

      public void cancelButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the cancellation action, discarding any input and returning to the customer main view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this method.
